scripts.full-install: pnpm install && cd common && pnpm install && cd ../server && pnpm install && cd ../client && pnpm install
scripts.full-reinstall: rm -r node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && cd common && rm -r node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && cd ../server && rm -r node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && cd ../client && rm -r node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && cd .. && pnpm full-install
scripts.full-upgrade: pnpm up * && cd common && pnpm up * && cd ../server && pnpm up * && cd ../client && pnpm up *
scripts.build: cd server && pnpm build && cd ../client && pnpm build
scripts.lint: cd common && pnpm lint && cd ../server && pnpm lint && cd ../client && pnpm lint
scripts.lint:ci: cd common && pnpm lint:ci && cd ../server && pnpm lint:ci && cd ../client && pnpm lint:ci
